UI: Content Card

Social Card

The Social Card displays social media posts, feeds, and embedded content. Features platform branding (Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, etc.), post content, engagement metrics (likes, shares, comments), post date, author/account, hashtags, and media attachments. Uses Schema.org/SocialMediaPosting markup.
